verbs.description: If [ARG0: we] [V: had] [ARG1: a wall] , Trump explains , he could spare us the annoyance of removing tots at the border .
[ARG1: If we had a wall] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: explains] , [C-ARG1: he could spare us the annoyance of removing tots at the border] .
If we had a wall , Trump explains , he [V: could] spare us the annoyance of removing tots at the border .
[ARGM-ADV: If we had a wall] , Trump explains , [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: spare] [ARG2: us] [ARG1: the annoyance of removing tots at the border] .
If we had a wall , Trump explains , he could spare us the annoyance of [V: removing] [ARG1: tots] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] .
